TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TemplateColumn extends System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumn

summary.span: 表示可讓您自訂資料行內控制項配置的 控制項的資料行型別。

span.span: Represents a column type for the control that allows you to customize the layout of controls in the column.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用的資料行類型控制項來建立自訂的控制項的版面配置的資料行。Use the column type in a control to create a column with a customized control layout. 您也可以使用的標題區段、 頁尾區段中，以及資料行中的項目 > 一節提供自訂外觀， ，和屬性，分別。You can provide a custom appearance for the heading section, the footer section, and the items section of the column by using the , , and properties, respectively. 您也可以控制所編輯的項目中顯示的方式物件藉由設定屬性。You can also control how an item being edited is displayed in the object by setting the property. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用類別來建立一個資料行控制項自訂版面配置。The following code example demonstrates how to use the class to create a column in the control with a custom layout. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/CS/templatecolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/VB/templatecolumnvb.aspx#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 類別的新執行個體。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用這個建構函式建立並初始化的新執行個體類別。Use this constructor to create and initialize a new instance of the class.

summary.span: 取得或設定樣板，用於在 物件中顯示選取來編輯的項目。

span.span: Gets or sets the template for displaying the item selected for editing in a object.

value.span: 實作的物件，包含用於在 中顯示被編輯之項目的樣板。

span.span: A -implemented object that contains the template for displaying the item being edited in the .

value.span: 預設值為 ，表示這個屬性未設定。

span.span: The default value is , which indicates that this property is not set.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用屬性，即可控制中進行編輯選取之項目的外觀物件。Use the property to control the appearance of the item selected for editing in the object. 指定藉由建立定義如何呈現資料行中的項目範本的外觀。The appearance is specified by creating a template that defines how the item is rendered in the column. 若要指定的範本進行編輯選取的項目，先將開啟和關閉``標記的開頭和結尾標記之間``項目。To specify a template for the item selected for editing, first place opening and closing `` tags between the opening and closing tags of the `` element. 然後，您可以列出控制在開頭和結尾之間的項目外觀的內容``標記。You can then list the content that controls the appearance of the item between the opening and closing `` tags. 內容可以為純文字，一樣簡單，或者可以設為更複雜將其他控制項內嵌在範本中。The content can be as simple as plain text, or it can be made more complex by embedding other controls in the template. ## Examples 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用屬性，即可控制正在編輯之項目的外觀物件。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to control the appearance of the item being edited in the object. [!code-aspx-csharp[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/CS/templatecolumncs.aspx#1)] [!code-aspx-vb[TemplateColumnEdit#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_WebNet/TemplateColumnEdit/VB/templatecolumnvb.aspx#1)]
